S

ScriptThread - Class in <Unnamed>
 
ScriptThread(ServerModel, ServerView) - Constructor for class ScriptThread
 
ServerController - Class in <Unnamed>
Class represents server controller.
It connects between ServerModel class and ServerView class
ServerController(ServerModel, ServerView) - Constructor for class ServerController
Constructor for Server Controller.
ServerMain - Class in <Unnamed>
The main class of the server.
Server is written in Model–view–controller design pattern
where the controller connects between the view and the model
ServerMain() - Constructor for class ServerMain
 
ServerModel - Class in <Unnamed>
The class ServerModel represents the model part
of the MVC pattern.
ServerModel() - Constructor for class ServerModel
 
ServerView - Class in <Unnamed>
Represents the View part of the MVC pattern.
This is a GUI for the server
ServerView() - Constructor for class ServerView
 
setButtonText(String) - Method in class ServerView
Sets a name for server button.
setServerStateRunning(boolean) - Method in class ServerView
Sets the statement of the server: running/not running
start() - Method in class Channel
Start a new thread with chat channel
start() - Method in class ScriptThread
 
start() - Method in class ServerController
Starts the server in a new thread
stop() - Method in class Channel
Stops the current thread
stop() - Method in class ScriptThread
 
stop() - Method in class ServerController
Stops the server and sends to all users
to disconnect before it stops.
